item.title: Brookfield's Teskey on AI and 'Robust' Real Estate Market
item.description: Brookfield Asset Management President Connor Teskey discusses the company’s utilization of AI and says he sees “robust” fundamentals in the real estate market. He speaks with Dani Burger on “Bloomberg

item.title: Brookfield Buys Stake in Duke Energy’s Florida Utility for $6 Billion
item.description: Brookfield Asset Management agreed to buy a 19.7% stake in Duke Energy Corp.’s Florida utility for $6 billion, a deal that will accelerate investment in the grid as the state’s population soars.

item.title: Brookfield Buys Stake in Duke Energy’s Florida Utility for $6 Billion
item.description: Brookfield Asset Management agreed to buy a 19.7% stake in Duke Energy Corp.’s Florida utility for $6 billion, a deal that will accelerate investment in the grid as the state’s population soars.

item.title: Brookfield, Birch Hill Snag Canadian Mortgage Firm in $2.1 Billion Deal
